snippet: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits dropped 6,000 to a seasonally adjusted 275,000 for the week ended Sept. 5, the Labor Department said on Thursday
abstract: Labor Department reports initial claims for state unemployment benefits fell 6,000 to seasonally adjusted 275,000 in latest week; reports import prices fell 1.8 percent in August.
lead_paragraph: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits dropped 6,000 to a seasonally adjusted 275,000 for the week ended Sept. 5, the Labor Department said on Thursday

headline.main: U.S. Jobless Claims Decline; Import Prices Fall, Too
headline.print_headline: U.S. Jobless Claims and Import Prices Fall
